name: Capone "Gang" Bege
text: On Play: You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand. Add up to 1 Character with the type "Supernova" from your hand to the top of your Life cards face-up.

effect.text: You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand. Add up to 1 Character with the type "Supernova" from your hand to the top of your Life cards face-up.
